part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal slats diffuse the volume of a two-way speaker. A small button pops from the bottom corner.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal slats diffuse the volume of a two-way speaker. A small button pops from the bottom corner.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Buttons are set in a vertical pair across a rectangle of scrawled-on metal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Buttons are set in a vertical pair across a rectangle of scrawled-on metal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A solitary button is center-set in a rectangle of scrawled-on metal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A black and grated metal platform is meadowed with the dust of time. It's crisscrossed with the tracks of tiny lifethings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sphinx scenes of post-Edification glamour are arrayed in gold and sunken relief around the lip of the black marble fount. The tracery of its bright veins spikes the eye but, downwell, recedes into a starless depth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smooth cerulean marble looks like holographic light annealed into solid rock. It's edged and cornered with gold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's an open portal of stacked stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The slate is touched with years of handprints and a ring of rust flakes off the top of the hinges. The door continues, though, its stubborn assertion of 'in' and 'out'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: At some moment in the door's past, an indweller unspooled their will to curiosity and cut an aperture for sight through the boundary.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rail to rail panels are bulwarked by a crossbar for reinforcement of the in and out margin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metals cut by the cosine saw were fit-welded and put to steel frame. The lock stile is padded in chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A furrowed metal plate is fit to the arch of the doorway, and a slide panel is cut from its center.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The two slates are touched with years of with handprints and a ring of rust flakes off the top of all its the hinges. The doors continues, though, their stubborn assertion of 'in' and 'out'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: At some moment in the double door's past, an indweller unspooled their will to curiosity and cut an aperture for sight through the boundary.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rail to rail panels are bulwarked by a crossbar for reinforcement of the in and out margin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rail to rail panels are bulwarked by a crossbar for reinforcement of the in and out margin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rail to rail panels are bulwarked by a crossbar for reinforcement of the in and out margin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rail to rail panels are bulwarked by a crossbar for reinforcement of the in and out margin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metals cut by the cosine saw were fit-welded and put to a double-wide steel frame. The lock stiles are padded in chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of furrowed metal plates are fit to the arch of the double doorway, and a slide panel is cut from their centers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Panes of see-through and polished glass are fit on a slide rail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pane of transparent glass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Panes of polished glass were frosted dark and fit on a slide rail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A furrowed metal plate is fit to the arch of the doorway, and a sliding panel sits recessed in the center. The panel is impressed with the mold of a key card.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A furrowed metal plate is fit to the arch of the doorway. Its hinges and rails were melted and fused to the wallframe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A elephant slab of copper-painted metal slumps out of its ancient doorframe. The handle is kept still by an ornate mechanical lock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A elephant slab of silver-painted metal slumps out of its ancient doorframe. The handle is kept still by an ornate mechanical lock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A elephant slab of gold-painted metal slumps out of its ancient doorframe. The handle is kept still by an ornate mechanical lock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Patinae have transformed the cyclopean bronze doors into great shelves of seafoam and coral. Lyrical death is depicted on the panels in high relief: chained cables lift inverted pyramids through a calcified village, gaseous fire, and vaults of brine. Skeleton harpists traipse across the freize, and goats chew copper bones on the cornices.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Patinae have transformed the cyclopean bronze doors into great shelves of seafoam and coral. Lyrical death is depicted on the panels in high relief: chained cables lift inverted pyramids through a calcified village, gaseous fire, and vaults of brine. Skeleton harpists traipse across the freize, and goats chew copper bones on the cornices.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Patinae have transformed the cyclopean bronze doors into great shelves of seafoam and coral. The theatre of life is depicted on the panels in high relief: palm leaves lift pyramids into the star-ribboned sky, and water pours over the lip of an oinochoe. Lovers yoke across the freize, and goats chew copper cud on the cornices.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Patinae have transformed the cyclopean bronze doors into great shelves of seafoam and coral. The theatre of life is depicted on the panels in high relief: palm leaves lift pyramids into the star-ribboned sky, and water pours over the lip of an oinochoe. Lovers yoke across the freize, and goats chew copper cud on the cornices.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: ornately engraved marble door with plaque

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright tracery charts a life time of meaning through the black marble void of the door's surface. A family name is inscribed on a memorial plaque.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright tracery charts a life time of meaning through the black marble void of the door's surface. A family name is inscribed on a memorial plaque.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright tracery charts a life time of meaning through the black marble void of the door's surface. A family name is inscribed on a memorial plaque.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: ornately engraved marble door with plaque

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bright tracery charts a life time of meaning through the black marble void of the door's surface. A family name is inscribed on a memorial plaque.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brinestalk is shaved into pickets and set across an iron-latched rail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Iron pickets are set across a latched rail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Copper, aluminum, and glass fiber were rounded into an electrical conduit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Copper, carbon, and glass fiber were rounded into a robust electrical conduit.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glass was blown into a machine artery.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glass was blown into a machine artery and ion-colored to fluorescent green-yellow with uranium.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was shaved, cut to smooth-volumed shafts, and fit inside gearboxes to convey motion in continuity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sailcloth is fastened to brined wooden arms that rotate by windsong and turn the central shaft.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Circles of limestone, porous and oyster-gray with the shells of old things, are arranged in vertical slabs and turned against each other to grind fibrous grains into flours.

part.Name: Mill
part.Transformations: Vinewafer,Lagroot Tuber,Mirror Shard,Psychal Gland,Voider Gland,Clump of Grave Moss,Compacted Bone Matter

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood paddles black with wet-rot catch the force of the babbling brook and set the wheel to the slow motion of centuries.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A burnished steel jacket hugs a smoldering fire pit. Scorchstrokes of many materials cake its sides.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A cased rotor is fed charge through a handcrank and supplemented by solar heat. Its scratched metal surfaces vibrate at ground frequency.

tag.Name: HeroNameTitleClientele
tag.Value: Appliances,Energy Cells,Power Grids,the Depleted,the Jacked,the Power-Hungry,Tinkers

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Induction coils are rooted under a cork pad, where electric juice is transferred to battery cells.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Magnetized steel drives a diaphragm upward and life water is propelled through chrome pipes to thirsty plants.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Q Girl replaced the old oscillator on this Barathrum clock with a swing pendulum. Now the several hours per day that Time cheats from its observers are reduced to mere minutes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: During the enterprise of invention, you sometimes require the use of a shapeless gray foam. Or, at the very least, you might require it one day, and so some tinker prudently got ahead of the problem and invented the brass foaminator. Inscribed on the base: 'All the foam, none of the sadness at maybe one day needing foam and not having it'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gas is pushed through a hose and ignited into flame. Dew gives texture to the hose barbs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rubber lines the inner topology of a motorized barrel. A kettle of ebon carbide grit sits in the underchamber ready to abrade.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Handwheel and spindle turn to sand off matter and gift the world with helices and round things. Metal dust accrues on the ground beneath.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Photovoltaics are arrayed across two socketed lunes. They spin for optimal range and confer sun energy to a vacuum-cased flywheel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sunrays are captured by photovoltaics across the foundation around a chrome cylinder, and the heat is used to pump water into pipes for dispersal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wired metal squares a cabinet of drawers and burners for toasting, pickling, and freeze-drying.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Shelves, pads, slates, and cradles are worked from metal like a chrome honeycomb. Electrical power gets concentrated into battery-juice and served into its docked cells.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Perfect-cut chrome rotors are stacked along a generator shaft, and wide fin blades catch the fluid push and spin electric yarn.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Down a traverse beam of plate shear metal thrusts a hydraulic piston. Its flat bottom is scratched into grooves by bits of trash.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the glass and steel chassis, a sea of force fluid churns in turbulence. It's then pulverized into solid matter by the dynamo and projected into space as a field.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Four flanged couplings form a cross with a wavegraph readout at the center. As liquids and gases pipe through, flux readings appear in neon strings.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Two copper bulbs form a spark gap that facilitates current along a path of ionized gas. The thing snaps and sparks at you.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside a metal chassis, amber glyphs ride the scanlines painted by a cathode ray. Frustum keys are arranged in quiet rows.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Magnetized innards digest electrical signals and belch out the waveform, while a diaphragm breaths dust onto a brass grill.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Soda ash and limestone flow down a series of hot crucibles and canals toward the batch blanket, where glass is then retrieved and refined.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A glinting spindle of steel is spiraled with grooves for stripping wire from raw nuggets and ingots.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal was braided into electromagnetic scaffolding, and through it the modulator molds the clay of the baseband and divulges the shape of the new signal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bits of tiny matter are smashed together behind the lune of a chrome cylinder, and the heat is used to pump electricity downgrid.

tag.Name: HeroNameTitleClientele
tag.Value: Appliances,Energy Cells,Power Grids,the Depleted,the Jacked,the Power-Hungry,Tinkers

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bits of tiny matter are smashed together behind the lune of a glass cylinder, and the heat is used to pump water into pipes for dispersal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cyclopean blades shaped to the airfoil are housed inside a metallic ring nicked with the scars of time. In the distant past, someone directed the course of air at grand scales.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Behind the pane of a bronzed frame are the programmable instruments of glassmaking: stove and blowpipe for hot work, oiler and wheel for cold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tetraxenonoglass walls and convalesscent gel recreate the conditions of the amnion where reptile, bird, and mammal embryos are nurtured to whole life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's worked from otherworldly limestone. The stone was quarried from a drift-world spinning about a darkling star whose weak luminescence didn't bleach the voidstuff from the rock's coral. Now it insulates its slumberer from the rays of materiality and conducts them to the psychic aether.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Water ribbons climb bone-blanched marble columns in high relief. They mount the archivolt and snake between helical rings before a sharp turn upward on the keystone. Here becomes there.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Water ribbons in high relief crumble off the broken marble. Pieces of the arch that once enclosed the forward motion of travelers now lie on smooth backs somewhere else.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A rectangle of neutrofoam imprinted with the human form hangs beneath an arch of glass. Across the foam at eye level, glyphs loop on an elliptical screen. Surgical machinery, obscured by blinding light, beetles out from the underside of an enclosing dome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Grease drips from an engine of bright chrome and stains the idlers. Pulley wheels are positioned at odd angles to churn flat rubber belts through space.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Putrid dross sticks to the grooves of flat black di-rubber.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bone-grey ash sticks to the grooves of flat black di-rubber.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Under a tarnished metal frame hangs a sheet of black rubber cut into pliable curtain strips.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stoneware catches the tiny bit of moisture surrendered by the bone-dry air.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stone was carved and shaped into a rough dome with square, even-spaced windows to let air flow. The small difference in temperature inside the dome causes dew to condense from air and accumulate in a catch basin below.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Heat from the salt sun evaporates brackish water. When the water condenses again, it's separated into its pure and impure elements: salt gloms on the still, while freshwater collects in the basin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome flanges maximize the surface area for evaporated air to re-settle as distilled dew.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sine waves breaking on the glass lune encode the behavioral primitives of the enclave's mechanical children. The electron field sucks them through the antenna and into the aether.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A coffin of steel, brass, and cathode tube conceals an array of precision instruments used to suck organ-matter from the dead and deliver it back to kith and kin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metalfoam is packed and plated into a colossal simulacrum of the bio-arm, where the heads of the biceps and triceps brachii gleam. Colossal joints chirr at the effort of rotation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metalfoam is packed and plated into a colossal simulacrum of the bio-arm, where the heads of the biceps and triceps brachii gleam. Brass pinchers snap the kinesis out of their target.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A brass hem surrounds a foam shunting pad, and the above-head fretwork is braided into the once-familiar glyphs of exit symbology.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Out of a gold-plated box, kaleidoscopic tiles and tones harmonize over several dimensions.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Diamond manifolds pressurize quartz into its ê form, crystallizing spacetime along the ley lines in the local region. Drops of normality condensate on the flue refract light into an inner dimension.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A fullerite hem surrounds a foam landing pad, and the above-head fretwork is braided into the once-familiar glyphs of recomposition and return symbology.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tracery on the fullerite hem is melted bright white and drips onto the cracked foam pad. Lily sprouts quicken in the cracks and push forth; life creeps outward.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The characteristic glass arch marks the enclosure as a becoming nook gutted and wire-stripped for a new purpose. A claw extends for soldering and shaping, and in the underdrum, a wheel spins wet clay fresh and ready for sunslag fermentation.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A crude stone hem surrounds a foam landing pad, and the above-head fretwork is braided into the new-fangled glyphs of reshaping and return symbology.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood planks are nailed at orthogonal angles, and dust sleeps on the paper jackets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Fabrics were stuffed with watervine chaff and laid across wooden slats in the style of the hillfolk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A goat wool bed fastened with canvas ties.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood slats are megaliths to a child. Feather pillows are cold meadows. Here are the boundaries of their dusk-world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Watervine canvas is stretched and folded over wood legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brinestraw was braided into a rope lattice saddle for slinging between two old oaks and napping. The fibers on the middle-sag are extra frayed from the center-mass strain of a reclining ass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was meticulously turned into columns and ornamentally whittled. Quilted downs were bartered from the seamstresses on the banks of the River Svy, layered as a cake and frosted with pillows. Here the moneyed slumberer finds a favored ingress to the dreaming dale.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plastic white as salt bleach was contoured for peaceful slumber, convalescence, and realignment of the humours.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wooden slats are laid on right angles in the style of the hillfolk. In place of a chaff cushion, however, lies a plastic mattress pumped with unctuous water, an alternative favored by raft-floaters who pine for the waves of the lake.

tag.Name: HeroNameTitleClientele
tag.Value: the Weary,the Tired,the Ebb and Flow,Sailors

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Historians of leisure divide all epochs into the following three ages: the span before ursine creatures evolve or civilizations rise to admire them, the span between ursine prominence and a civilization's capacity to fashion divans in their likeness, and thence the span until the civilization's fall.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hidden micro-reactors smash together particles, generate heat, and power the biotic machine apparatus that rejuvenates the weary slumberer.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Planks of wood are nailed together at right angles in the style of the marsh dwellers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stuffed with watervine chaff and glowcrow feathers, this buttoned pillow lets folk repose with crossed legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Convivia in the limen, the boundary between sun-baked Moghra'yi and the shade of the Spindle, involves the mulling of cider, holography, and the arrangement of klinai at right angles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Planks of wood are nailed together simply to form the austere seat.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nothing is in situ, everything is in motion, and the seated must prepare for the next moment where the memory of leisure is burned in neurotic effigy. The stool abides these truths.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Jointed wood and knit watervine make a movable wharf for the ass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The ornamentation of etched metal and precious stones designate the axis mundi.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Kneaded under the salt sun by a leatherworker and stuffed with glowcrow feathers for the repose of its owner.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plastic white as salt bleach was contoured for ideal digestion and harmony of the humors.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's fitted with a crankshaft that turns a dimpled rubber sheet and kneads kinks out the hindparts of its sitter.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Tight-fitted black mesh straightens the spine. Wheels descend from casters and locomote.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plastic white as salt bleach was contoured to the posture for ideal rumination.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Historians of leisure divide all epochs into the following three ages: the span before ursine creatures evolve or civilizations rise to admire them, the span between ursine prominence and a civilization's capacity to fashion divans in their likeness, and thence the span until the civilization's fall.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In its new context the peptic chair menaces. Dried blood paints the plastic seat, and its catheters fray like a knot of worms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hidden micro-reactors smash together particles, generate heat, and power the biotic machine apparatus that restores life to the wounded recliner.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plastic smoothed on a heat lathe was kneaded into a design that evokes an Eater's intuition for how a perfect ball warps spacetime around itself.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plumpness in the cushion is gauged to the seated thinker, lancet arches press into the playful back, and claw-and-ball feet suggest a hidden life within the piece itself. This is a chair laden with meaning.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Guild furniture makers, conspiring in a bright workroom beneath the Eaters' sun, stretched a cushion to the precise size of two ardent lovers and set a pleasing mail diamond at its right angle. The claw-and-ball feet suggest movement.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This bowl-shaped basket of scrounged textiles and padding yawns with the promise of a humble, comfortable embrace followed by a laborious escape.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Starfish arms are stuffed with plant matter, stiffened, and fixed around a concave disc to the perfect shape of a floor cushion for bipeds. The axial arm keeps the neck straight and upright, and a meadow of underspines administers a subtle therapeutic puncturing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rich green tufts are weaved to a dense and soft lattice, stuffed with watervine chaff and glowcrow feathers, and then hung on a angled wood frame.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wood storage box with a hinged lid and latch. Notches scratched on the surface hint at the full probability array of language, and also its absence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A wood storage box with a hinged lid and latch. Notches scratched on the surface hint at the full probability array of language, and also its absence. A drop of spilled water is engraved on an open lock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Surfaces of dull steel are cornered in brass and smudged with finger age. The lid is latched shut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Surfaces of dull steel are cornered in brass and smudged with finger age. The lid is latched shut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Surfaces of dull steel are cornered in brass and smudged with finger age. The lid is latched shut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Surfaces of dull steel are cornered in brass and smudged with finger age. The lid is latched shut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Surfaces of dull steel are cornered in brass and smudged with finger age. The lid is latched shut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Surfaces of dull steel are cornered in brass and smudged with finger age. The lid is latched shut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Surfaces of dull steel are cornered in brass and smudged with finger age. The lid is latched shut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Surfaces of dull steel are cornered in brass and smudged with finger age. The lid is latched shut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Teeth, shell, and bones were blackened into stasis by the earthy gunk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brass bands frame an old iron box eaten red by air and rain.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Surfaces of dull steel are smudged with finger age. The lid is painted with a red crux and latched shut.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A metal locker that looks worn with age.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Metal slates partition the chrome carton into golden rectangles. Inside, artifacts await their planned abrasion and return to mineral form.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wooden and chrome poles let weapons rest peacefully.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wooden and chrome poles let guns rest peacefully.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wooden and chrome poles let armor rest peacefully.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome pegs form a lattice where bionic modules await coupling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chrome pegs form a lattice where modules await coupling.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A latched box of polished and ageproof metal is indented with numbered rectangles.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In a dusty corner of the past, nameless workers glazed striated marble and inlaid it with gold to house the heirlooms and grave goods of a slump-shouldered Eater.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cyclopean marble slates enclose an interdiction prism for imperial treasures, including the creatural and sovereign Face. Across their vast surfaces, goldwork plots the geometric sequences of life and its boundaries; water spills down the bodies of world-caryatides and curls back to the welkin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cyclopean marble slates enclose an interdiction prism for imperial treasures, including the creatural and sovereign Face. Across their vast surfaces, goldwork plots the geometric sequences of life and its boundaries; water spills down the bodies of world-caryatides and curls back to the welkin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In a dusty corner of the past, nameless workers glazed striated marble and inlaid it with amethyst to house the earthly gear of a High Eater returned.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Marble striations smear into melted pink rock slag; the ageless box lies open.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Marsh reed was handcrossed by warp and weft into a vessel for sheaf and other dry goods.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slide drawers of galvanized metal are arranged in a cabinet as rectangles of assorted dimensions. Storage is fractal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Burnished bronze is burned to light-in-ceremony by hot coal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Burnished bronze is burned to light-in-ceremony by hot coal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A brightly burning handfire hangs across wood and iron.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sconce of wood and iron hangs lightless.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sharp points of chrome are the vertices of this utilitarian light fixture. Brightness bursts from its edges and lights the world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sharp points of chrome are the vertices of this utilitarian light fixture. Brightness bursts from its edges and lights the world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sharp points of chrome are the vertices of this utilitarian light fixture. Brightness bursts from its edges and lights the world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sharp points of chrome are the vertices of this utilitarian light fixture. Full-spectrum brightness bursts from its edges and lights the world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wax weeps from the stubborn candles, drips onto the sconces, forms a waxfall through the tiers of bronze.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wax weeps from the stubborn candles, drips onto the sconces, forms a waxfall through the tiers of bronze.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sharp points of chrome are the vertices of this ornamental light fixture. Brightness bursts from its edges and ignites the world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A large storage vase with a decorative slip. The style hints that it was fired in the home-kiln of a canyon dweller.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A vessel of freeblown glass curves at the lunar arc. The style hints that it originates from the coast of the Fuming God Sea, on the far side of Moghra'yi, and that it was likely exported by the dromads.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glass was blown to a wide bowl and thin stem in the tradition of the grove-carpeted mountain lagynos. Were the style's first artisans working through the thick and ripe air of the musa wood? Did Spindle glitter dust their marvers and pipes?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A trailed vessel was first thrown on the potter's wheel in the soft warmth of morning. A canyoneer shaped the lip with extra care to preserve the precious liquids of life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Bronze was melted and cooled, shaped and etched, to deliver the water of life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay was rounded and kilned to store oils and wine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay was rounded and kilned to store oils and wine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay was rounded and kilned to store oils and wine.

object.Name: Jug Wide Eastern Style with Wine

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay was spun on the potter's wheel and shaped into waves, fired, and glazed into a traditional vessel.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay was spun on the potter's wheel and shaped into waves, fired, and glazed into a ceremonial vessel. Two pictographs are panelled side-by-side: 'life' and 'drink'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glazed and superheated clay lies cracked open. Two pictographs have been rendered illegible.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Painted crenulations wrap around the equator of this metal vase.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The warming phosphor of early earth is neatly latticed by woodbrick, and functions now as a microscopic star.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A burnt out wood core is enveloped in footprinted ash.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the thick clay oven, and with it comes the smell of scrumptious food.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the thick clay oven, and with it comes the smell of scrumptious food.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the thick clay oven, and with it comes the smell of hot starapple jam and toasted matz.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the round mud oven, and with it comes the smell of mulled cider and brined mushrooms.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the round clay oven, and with it comes the smell of steamed goat and sweet bananas.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the round clay oven, and with it comes the smell of fermented tongue and congealed love.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the round bone oven, and with it comes the smell of leavened pastry, sweet bananas, and warm skulk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the bright stone oven, and with it comes the smell of hot spine fruit jam and roasted tail.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the thick clay oven, and with it comes the smell of lah broth and steamed matz.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the dark electric oven, and with it comes the smell of bitter yuckwheat and boiled plasma.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Warmth radiates from the crackling fire of the round crystalline oven, and with it comes the smell of cooling static. Curiously, there are no prepared meal ingredients here.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Branches of the living tree were resorbed and reformed into trunk knots. Then, hundreds of years later, the oiled saw of a gorge woodworker disarranged the arbor geometry and flattened it for civil use. That history remains cast in two dimensions, powdered with dust and scratched in pencil.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Steel was anointed with liquid chrome, cooled, and beaten into a flat and workable surface.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Knotted wood of good moisture content holds the weight of earth at right angles. Scorch marks and salt decorate the grooves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was salvaged from moist groves, shaved into planks, and carried to the freeholds on the Shale Bridge. There it was received by carpenters who, acclimated to the wetless air, eagerly took the rich wood for their own projects.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A sharp rectangle seems to have been balanced on a metal pole over a smaller rectangle, forming a steady working surface. No welding scars are visible.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: It's scratched on top where a pestle splintered the wood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Decorated with painted mandalas and shaped by the geometric hand, the table honors symmetry and numerology.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wood was precisely cut into drawers and set on brass rails to house clothes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dwellers in the earth-clefts fashion tables in the style of puzzle boxes. Their drawers house the stenographic imagination.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Etched chromium on the lavish legs tapers to claw-and-ball feet, and on the marble surface, geometric imperfections were rasped off and flung into an iron bucket that may still exist somewhere. Eaters spoke here, and planned.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A table scorched with the radial patterns of hot chemistry holds a phial rack and alembic.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: In high relief, folds and knots of sandy hued shapes crown the sapphire surface of the spherical model. The juxtaposition of scales, the proportion of sea to land, and the collective wisdom harnessed to devise such a thing make your head spin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brass gears, balls, and rings turn in precise mimicry of worlds and stars.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Barathrum's invention records time to the momentary tick by regulating its advance with a crown wheel. On learning of its utility, the water barons commissioned the assembly of dozens more in order to take precise measurements of their reservoirs at set moments of the day.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: During the enterprise of invention, you sometimes require the use of a shapeless gray foam. Or, at the very least, you might require it one day, and so some tinker prudently got ahead of the problem and invented the brass foaminator. Inscribed on the base: 'All the foam, none of the sadness at maybe one day needing foam and not having it'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glass lunes refract light and paint images in fictive angular size.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The delphic countenace of the Tungsten King is frozen in chrome, cast to perfect specification.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Hard chrome was cast in the mold of soft cheeks and rounded brow; the patron king of scholarship is canonized.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slink-green plant lobes splay out of the ancient cauldron with chromium incision. They live and breathe like their loam-bound cousins, but their bio-data was spliced with the amaranthine seed. They do not die even as the Eaters about them decompose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slink-green plant lobes splay out of the ancient cauldron with chromium incision. They live and breathe like their loam-bound cousins, but their bio-data was spliced with the amaranthine seed. They do not die even as the Eaters about them decompose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slink-green plant lobes splay out of the ancient cauldron with chromium incision. They live and breathe like their loam-bound cousins, but their bio-data was spliced with the amaranthine seed. They do not die even as the Eaters about them decompose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slink-green plant lobes splay out of the ancient cauldron with chromium incision. They live and breathe like their loam-bound cousins, but their bio-data was spliced with the amaranthine seed. They do not die even as the Eaters about them decompose.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Sheared slate stone is powdered with the cloudy remnants of externalized thought and held aloft by the monster.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Plastic housed in grainy wood is perforated in a grid of contact points. Capacitors and inductors are fastened in the spring clips and networked with a bouquet of wire.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside the scratched metal C a needle and a bobbin prepare to punch a pair of threads into a lockstitch. Initials are carved all around its pedestal.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The biped form emerges out of a cocoon of wood and fiberglass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The biped form emerges out of a gigantic cocoon of wood and fiberglass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Blue laser light bursts out of the reference beam and reimagines a wavefront sculpted on a light lathe. Air adds a layer of grain.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Foam plush is arranged into gyri and sulci to mimic the brain maze.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The wet paints of earth -- clay, slag, chrome, and dye -- slouch a half-idea with material weight. The transformation is arrested through indecision or neglect.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Marble blossoms on top as a spiraling volute. The column is splattered with paint.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nacreous oil wets the ecru linen and has dripped onto the easel. From the plane of the canvas, an image is pressed out.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Half-moon glass roofs the subterrarium and protects the corpse eaters, who have prospered inside. They are an arcology of gills.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Gnu-gut strings run strata across the soundboard, and rose gold caps the rich wood knee and head. The frame forms half a heart; the Eaters' favorite remains.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rectangle keys are arranged down the angled ladder to step upwise in pitch. Hanging on frame is a note mallet.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Strings of gnu gut are stretched across the trapezoid. The note spoon hangs in a wooden sheath.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Rust-caked spines line the interior of an iron sarcophagus. Dissatisfied with the caliber of earthly punishments, its deviser sought to deprave even the restful slumber of eternity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Smoking stems bloom from a crystal waterpipe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The box is wrought from chewed wire and dented iron.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Brinestalk splinters and smokes inside a piped hearth of old stone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A hunk of crude granite has been smoothed on top for metalworking and rounded at the side into a shaping horn.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This statue worked from *material* intricately depicts *creature.a**creature*:

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Erosion has smoothed its features into abstraction, but once it stood in monument to the coupling of machine and folk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Features erupt from a stone canvas and shatter into a figure from the deep past. Hair, skin, brow, thigh: the details hatch a new emotion inside you, the sense of the strange-familiar. As you move about the petrified likeness, you wonder at how this Eater managed to incise themself into your spacetime braid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: This stone idol of Oboroqoru stands twenty spans tall. Its nameless sculptor chose to depict the ape god sitting cross-legged with each of his three pairs of gargantuan arms grasping each other. The idol is swathed in vines, its caretakers ceding to nature save where the herbage has threatened to obscure Oboroqoru's gentle countenance. Wreaths of flowers of every hue the forest begets -- azure, chartreuse, indigo, carnelian -- litter the base of the shrine, insignificant offerings to what appears to be a callous god.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Abandoned in a tucked-away hut on Bey Lah's outskirts, this enormous statue of hornsfel languishes under a layer of withered vegetation. It depicts a majestic deer with one hoof raised from the ground, its humanlike eyes judging its surroundings and finding them wanting. The metal plaque on the base of the statue hasn't fared well over the centuries, and the only glyphs you can make out are 'K', 'R', 'S', and 'H'.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Nisroch the star mason is depicted here straddling the earth with his mighty legs. He dons his favorite sash, whose folds are exquisitely worked in gold.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The statue of Bel wears its tremendous weight in polished marble. He wields his epochal aegis, storied for obstructing a swirling gas cloud in the starry dawn.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Here Shekhinah has been sculpted into permanence with magnificent cerulean marble. His body is chiseled to blessed perfection. His golden diadem crowns him Father among Fathers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Dagon the orator domineers the west apse with his brazen pose. His golden coronet shines splendidly in the fire's shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Carthax the athlete is depicted here mid-stride. His glistening silver hair is tied behind his head, in astral tradition, as he vaults through the firmament.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Resheph, who's called 'the Above', lifts an enigmatic finger to heal the wounds of the sick.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A monstrous head slumps in old stone, etched cysts sprouting from the central chine to evoke the spread of disease from its halfgod source. Generations of moss skirt the beast's warted legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Slumping shoulders edge the valley of a cracked stone back, and two pairs of mated arms join at their hundred-knuckles in the stonecarver's depiction of the halfgod's quickening. Generations of moss skirt the beast's varicose legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A spiny monstrous fish sits in a pool of stonecarved water. Underneath is the finned tail that poets have beating a foamy brine out the pipes at Maqqom to form the Hinnom lake. Generations of moss skirt its underfin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Chiseled spines wreathe the sinuous worldeater, who dug the earthly caves that were peopled by late-stage troglodytes. The hundred-nine eyes of legend peer across time, and generations of moss skirt the beast's banded undergirth.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The halfgod kneels on hinds worked wide in old stone. Tiled polygons spill off the statue's base to evoke Qas's rightening of space, time, mountain, and village. Generations of moss skirt the beast's treecutter hooves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A godswan sits in stone grace with its gigantic kite train furled to a dizzying gyre. She wears a blank and unreadable expression, to evoke the carver's sense of her as uncertainty's incubus. Generations of moss skirt the beast's down feathers.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Burnt light erupts on the chromium plate and shatters into a figure from the deep past. Hair, skin, brow, thigh: the features hatch a new emotion inside you, the sense of the strange-familiar. As you move about, the figure moves in parallax; you wonder at how this Eater managed to incise themself into your spacetime braid.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glorious Shekhinah, Argent Adonis and First Father, poses in luminous mummery. With the stature of the ageless stars, fixed and permanent, He appraises the temple erected in His honor and cocks His head in approval. Befitting the memory of His union with the Kasaphescence, He clothes His manifestation in cerulean shades, forsaking the viridians and russets of the lowly plants and clay earth.

part.Name: Chat
part.Says: [Shekhinah turns toward you, His arms wide.]

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Stone asserts its importance by orienting toward the firmament, whence the oldest wisdom stirs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: The bellies of vessels are sacred, for they both carry the waters of life and project the fluid past onto the convex present.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Etched into this mead hall for small, winged friends are stories they cannot understand.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A narrative is confined to the etched boundaries of this stone, to the reductive duality of its form.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Glyphs inscribed into the ancient stone are refracted into the present.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Moss-stuff inserts itself into the story-world evoked into being by the carved rock.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: From the hands of a metalworker rods and strips erupted and cooled into shape.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Reverence was paid to the orb, smoothed toward ideality and hoisted on brass legs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Flickering interference patterns of light form a moire-cascading tableau.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Flickering interference patterns of light form a moire-cascading tableau.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text:
This object is a monument to a scene from the history of {{M|Kyakukya}}.
Under the Beetle Moon, folks settled here to gather goods of passage for Ape Saad Oboroqoru, and so Kyakukya was founded.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text:
This object is a monument to a scene from the history of {{M|Kyakukya}}.
In 979, Nuntu, the legendary albino ape, grew tired of bludgeoning things to death and journeyed to a root-strangled place on the River Svy. There he came upon Kyakukya and its inhabitants. The villagers of Kyakukya asked Nuntu to employ his magisterial skills and lead the village.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text:
This object is a monument to a scene from the history of the {{M|Yd Freehold}}.
Centuries after the height of the Gyre, the svardym Goek, Mak, and Geeub met the galgal Many Eyes while languishing inside of a reef sponge. Together they founded the Yd Freehold to live out the rest of their lives.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text:
This object is a monument to a scene from the history of the {{M|Yd Freehold}}.
In 901, the villagers of the Yd Freehold and its founders abolished all forms of hierarchy from their settlement. The two pillars of civic life in the Freehold thus became anarchy and authenticity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A terracotta board has been painted with ochre and ground iron.

part.Name: Chat
part.Says: Fine Wares from the Consortium of Phyta

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: ornately engraved marble door with plaque

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Geometric shapes of meaning tessellate the ringed rows around the crematory vessel: stars, triquetrae, nonagons, and lunes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Black marble was quarried from the vast reaches of the underearth and chiseled into a stone blanket for the dead.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cirrus clouds of neon stir inside a glass lune and beam light through the prefigured likeness of the sultan. A bleary shape thus hovers supine above the starless and gigantic black rock divan. The artist may have intended this to evoke a lightning storm over a dark plain or a lily on the pitch of a river: something to represent the bright and gaseous mind roaming over the inert body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Cirrus clouds of neon stir inside a glass lune and beam light through the prefigured likeness of the sultan. A bleary shape thus hovers supine above the starless and gigantic black rock divan. The artist may have intended this to evoke a lightning storm over a dark plain or a lily on the pitch of a river: something to represent the bright and gaseous mind roaming over the inert body.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Wet clay sticks to a wheel and soldering board. It's flowered with diodes, circuits, vane pumps, and magnets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Clay was fired around steel and erected in the rib cage for structural support.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A pair of retractible chrome panels are fit on oiled tracks.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Teal foam pads the inside back and the deep seat well, and dials deck the curved armrests. The whole chair swivels atop an ejection motor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Teal foam pads the inside back and the deep seat well, and a single dial dresses the right armrest. The whole chair swivels atop an ejection motor.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Inside a metal frame damp with soup dew, a glass lune is painted with the data glyphs of navigation and two-body alignment. 3D models of a large and smaller creature rotate on their vertical axes, and a psychoelectric scan shows the status of the meld.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: Teal foam pads the inside back and the deep seat well, and dials deck the curved armrests. The whole chair swivels atop an ejection motor.
